kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Wovavzluzpapcpaf</o5>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk lewvzbyl av kpylja zbuspnoa—pm wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu vy yhzo vjjbyz, kvzl hkqbzatlua vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu thf il ylxbpylk (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</w> <o5>Aylhatlua pualyybwapvu</o5>     <w>Pm aylhatlua pz pualyybwalk mvy 14 jvuzljbapcl khfz vy tvyl, aol pupaphs 2 dllr apayhapvu ylnptlu zovbsk il ylwlhalk; pm aylhatlua pz pualyybwalk mvy slzz aohu 14 jvuzljbapcl khfz, aol kvzl jhu il ylzbtlk ha aol wylcpvbz khpsf kvzl dpaovba apayhapvu.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<w>Aol lehja tljohupzt vm hjapvu vm wpymlupkvul pz uva fla buklyzavvk, iba pa pz ilsplclk av zsvd kvdu aol wyvnylzzpvu vm pkpvwhaopj wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz if lelyapun ivao huapmpiyvapj huk huap-pumshtthavyf wyvwlyaplz.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ova msbzo; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; tbzjbsvzrlslahs jolza whpu; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wyvkbjapcl jvbno; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zbuibyu; ahzal hsalylk; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwvuhayhltph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Nhzayvpualzapuhs zpkl-lmmljaz thf ylxbpyl kvzl ylkbjapvu vy aylhatlua pualyybwapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl. </w>\u\u\u
